name: Ebonite Death
description: Poisons form the whole craft in the assassination. This one was created by the brewmaster Shar'akin from the West Aqshy realm. It smells like a good portion of death, and looks like a senility in their liquid form.
effect: After you have successfully hit with a Combat weapon, you can roll a dice. On the roll of 1, discard this card. On the roll of 2-4, nothing happens. On the roll of 5 or 6, target suffers an extra wound.
